question.ask: 1. You don’t look well. What’s the matter?

std.value: I feel painful in my stomach.
std.ai: I feel painful in my stomach.

std.value: I failed my math exam. I feel sad.
std.ai: I failed my math exam. I feel sad.

std.value: I don’t know. I’m not feeling well after having the sandwich.
std.ai: I don’t know. I’m not feeling well after having the sandwich.

question.keywords: feel painful stomach|failed math exam feel sad|don’t know I’m not feeling well after having sandwich

question.ask: 2. Do you mind if I leave my bag here?

std.value: No, I don’t mind. Please put it here.
std.ai: No, I don’t mind. Please put it here.

std.value: Not at all. You can put it here.
std.ai: Not at all. You can put it here.

std.value: Sorry, this is my friend’s seat and he’ll be here later.
std.ai: Sorry, this is my friend’s seat and he’ll be here later.

question.keywords: No don’t mind Please put here|Not at all You can put here|Sorry this friend’s seat and he’ll here later

question.ask: 3. I don’t think the movie is as exciting as I expected.

std.value: Neither do I. That movie is too boring.
std.ai: Neither do I. That movie is too boring.

std.value: Really? But I think it’s exciting for me.
std.ai: Really? But I think it’s exciting for me.

question.ask: 4. I’m afraid I have to be going.

std.value: OK. Be careful and have a good trip.
std.ai: OK. Be careful and have a good trip.

std.value: Oh, it’s still early now. Please have lunch with us before your leaving.
std.ai: Oh, it’s still early now. Please have lunch with us before your leaving.

question.keywords: careful have good trip|early now have lunch before leaving|See next time
